properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 01 MAY
   BY M/V BGP CHALLENGER AND M/V SEA MOBY DICK
   TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   02-51.59N 045-47.29W, 02-42.02N 047-47.29W,
   04-38.26N 047-06.30W, 04-38.26N 046-01.20W,
   03-33.22N 046-01.19W, 03-33.22N 047-00.11W.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 02 MAY 16.
